channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Maximo Anywhere
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Maximo Anywhere

item.title: CVE-2019-4286|2024-09-16T22:51:46.109Z -- ibm -- maximo%20anywhere
item.description: IBM Maximo Anywhere 7.6.2.0, 7.6.2.1, 7.6.3.0, and 7.6.3.1 could disclose highly senstiive user information to an authenticated user with physical access to the device. IBM X-Force ID: 160514.

item.title: CVE-2019-4291|2024-09-16T22:41:03.211Z -- ibm -- maximo%20anywhere
item.description: IBM Maximo Anywhere 7.6.4.0 could allow an attacker to reverse engineer the application due to the lack of binary protection precautions. IBM X-Force ID: 160697.

item.title: CVE-2019-4266|2024-09-16T16:47:53.068Z -- ibm -- maximo%20anywhere
item.description: IBM Maximo Anywhere 7.6.2.0, 7.6.2.1, 7.6.3.0, and 7.6.3.1 does not have device jailbreak detection which could result in an attacker gaining sensitive information about the device. IBM X-Force ID: 160199.
